abstract.t: ALTO servers require automated operation, where the topology of theunderlying networks is incorporated into network maps automatically.In addition to the Client-to-Server API defined in the ALTO protocoldocument, two more standardized API are required: an API between theALTO Server and networking nodes (e.g. routers), through which theALTO Server can get topology information from the network, and an APIbetween the ALTO Servers, through which they can exchange topologyand status information between themselves.
